entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text:
@realDonaldTrump How is your LYSOL ingestion treatments coming along? 

You know... if you stopped ALL COVID-19 testing all together, YOU will have created the cure for coronavirus because clearly there would be no more infections and resulting death. Definitely a Nobel Peace Prize will be yours!
